{{Description|A Fatui mage who can command Cicins in battle.<br />Similarly to the way that Cicins go crazy for Mist Grass, Cicin Mages take great pleasure in toying with their prey.<br />They seem to wander the land aimlessly, as if compelled by some unknown duty.}}
'''Fatui Cicin Mages''' are [[Fatui/Enemies|Fatui]] [[Elite Enemies]] who can summon [[Cicins]] and carry [[Delusions]]. They come in two elements: [[Electro]] and [[Cryo]].

Similarly to the [[Fatui Agents]], Fatui Cicin Mages are always found wandering by themselves.
